title: Internet Hate Machine with Bridget Todd
itunes:title: Internet Hate Machine with Bridget Todd
description:
The US midterms have once again brought to the forefront the abuse women, especially Black women and women of color, face online and the consequences of dismissing it. Bridget Todd breaks down how the internet has been weaponized, what we can do about it, and her new podcast Internet Hate Machine.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The US midterms have once again brought to the forefront the abuse women, especially Black women and women of color, face online and the consequences of dismissing it. Bridget Todd breaks down how the internet has been weaponized, what we can do about it, and her new podcast Internet Hate Machine.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, bridget todd, internet hate machine, black women online, black women internet, online abuse, online harrassment, social media, women online
